source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.employee_dim)
- **New Data:** where a Pers_No in the source does not exist as an EmployeeNumber in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Pers_No in source and EmployeeNumber in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an EmployeeNumber in the target exists but the same Pers_No doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View employee_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build Employee_Dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employee_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.Pers_No IS NULL
        THEN T7.EmployeeInfoID
        ELSE NULL
    END as EmployeeInfoID, -- surrogate key
    T8.EmployeeID,
    T1.First_name as FirstName,
    T1.Last_name as LastName,
    T1.Gender_Key as Gender,
    T2.Street_and_House_Number as AddressLine1,
    T2.`2nd_Address_Line` as AddressLine2,
    T2.District as AddressLine3,
    T2.City as City,
    T2.Region_State_Province_Count as County,
    T2.Postal_Code as PostCode,
    T3.Email_Address as EmailAddress,
    T2.Personal_Mobile as TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    T2.Work_Mobile as TelephoneNumberWork,
    T1.FTE,
    T1.Wk_hrs as WorkHours,
    T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee as PartTimeEmployee,
    T1.Employment_Status as EmploymentStatus,
    T1.Civil_Service_Start as CivilServiceStart,
    T1.Date_to_Current_Job as DateToCurrentJob,
    T1.Seniority_Date as SeniorityDate,
    T1.Org_Start_Date as OrgStartDate,
    T1.Fix_Term_End_Date as FixTermEndDate,
    T1.Loan_Start_Date as LoanStartDate,
    T1.Loan_End_Date as LoanEndDate,
    T1.Assignment_Number as AssignmentNumber,
    NULL as AnnualSalary, -- T1.Annual_salary
    T1.curr as Currency,
    T1.Date_to_Subst_Grade as DateToSubstantiveGrade,
    T4.SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp as IngestionDate,
    NULL as ValidTo,
    md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.First_name,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Last_name,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Gender_Key, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Street_and_House_Number, '.'),IFNULL(T2.`2nd_Address_Line`, '.'),IFNULL(T2.District, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.City, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Region_State_Province_Count, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Postal_Code, '.'),IFNULL(T3.Email_Address, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Personal_Mobile, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Work_Mobile, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.FTE,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Wk_hrs,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,'.'),T1.Employment_Status,IFNULL(T1.Civil_Service_Start, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Current_Job, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Seniority_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Org_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Fix_Term_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Payroll_Area,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Assignment_Number, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Employee_Group,'.'),IFNULL(T1.curr,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Subst_Grade,'.'))) as RowID, 
    'Y' as IsActive, 
    T7.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr T1
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses T2 ON T1.Pers_No = T2.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.vw_email T3 ON T1.Pers_No = T3.Staff_Number
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T4 ON "SAP HR" = T4.Description and T4.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT staff_number, max(ded_from) as AnnualLeaveStartDate
            FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_leave
            GRoup BY Staff_Number) T5 ON T1.Pers_No = T5.staff_number   
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T8 ON T1.Pers_No = T8.EmployeeNumber AND T8.IsActive = 'Y' 
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim T7 ON T8.EmployeeID = T7.EmployeeID AND T7.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Pers_No = T8.EmployeeNumber AND md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.First_name,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Last_name,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Gender_Key, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Street_and_House_Number, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.`2nd_Address_Line`, '.'),IFNULL(T2.District, '.'), IFNULL(T2.City, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Region_State_Province_Count, '.'),IFNULL(T2.Postal_Code, '.'),IFNULL(T3.Email_Address, '.'),
                IFNULL(T2.Personal_Mobile, '.'), IFNULL(T2.Work_Mobile, '.'), IFNULL(T1.FTE,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Wk_hrs,'.'),IFNULL(T1.Indicator_Part_Time_Employee,'.'),T1.Employment_Status,
                IFNULL(T1.Civil_Service_Start, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Current_Job, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Seniority_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Org_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Fix_Term_End_Date, '.'),
                IFNULL(T1.Loan_Start_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Loan_End_Date, '.'),IFNULL(T1.Payroll_Area,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Assignment_Number, '.'), IFNULL(T1.Employee_Group,'.'),IFNULL(T1.curr,'.'), 
                IFNULL(T1.Date_to_Subst_Grade,'.')))  <> T7.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T8.EmployeeNumber IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.Pers_No IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )
;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **employee_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View employee_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW employee_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    EmployeeInfoID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID, 
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    Gender,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    City,
    County,
    PostCode,
    EmailAddress,
    TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    TelephoneNumberWork,
    FTE,
    WorkHours,
    PartTimeEmployee,
    EmploymentStatus,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DateToCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    AssignmentNumber,
    AnnualSalary,
    Currency,
    DateToSubstantiveGrade,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From employee_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    EmployeeInfoID, -- surrogate key
    EmployeeID, 
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    Gender,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    City,
    County,
    PostCode,
    EmailAddress,
    TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    TelephoneNumberWork,
    FTE,
    WorkHours,
    PartTimeEmployee,
    EmploymentStatus,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DateToCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    AssignmentNumber,
    AnnualSalary,
    Currency,
    DateToSubstantiveGrade,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim
WHERE EmployeeID IN (SELECT EmployeeID FROM employee_dim_new WHERE EmployeeInfoID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View employee_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.employee_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim AS Target
USING employee_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.EmployeeInfoID = Target.EmployeeInfoID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.employee_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EmployeeInfoID NULLS LAST) AS EmployeeInfoID, 
    EmployeeID, 
    FirstName,
    LastName,
    Gender,
    AddressLine1,
    AddressLine2,
    AddressLine3,
    City,
    County,
    PostCode,
    EmailAddress,
    TelephoneNumberPersonal,
    TelephoneNumberWork,
    FTE,
    WorkHours,
    PartTimeEmployee,
    EmploymentStatus,
    CivilServiceStart,
    DateToCurrentJob,
    SeniorityDate,
    OrgStartDate,
    FixTermEndDate,
    LoanStartDate,
    LoanEndDate,
    AssignmentNumber,
    AnnualSalary,
    Currency,
    DateToSubstantiveGrade,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim;
